comment: Smart Data Models - UnderexcLimIEEE2 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/UnderexcLimIEEE2/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents the Type UEL2 which has either a straight-line or multi-segment characteristic when plotted in terms of machine reactive power output vs. real power output.  Reference: IEEE UEL2 421.5-2005 Section 10.2.  (Limit characteristic lookup table shown in Figure 10.4 (p 32) of the standard).

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: k1
contents.comment: UEL terminal voltage exponent applied to real power input to UEL limit look-up table (k1).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k2
contents.comment: UEL terminal voltage exponent applied to reactive power output from UEL limit look-up table (k2).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kfb
contents.comment: Gain associated with optional integrator feedback input signal to UEL (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kuf
contents.comment: UEL excitation system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kui
contents.comment: UEL integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kul
contents.comment: UEL proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: p0
contents.comment: Real power values for endpoints (P).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: p1
contents.comment: Real power values for endpoints (P).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.comment: Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

contents.comment: Real power values for endpoints (P).  Typical Value = 0.9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: p4
contents.comment: Real power values for endpoints (P).  Typical Value = 1.02. Default: 0.0

contents.comment: Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

contents.comment: Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

contents.name: p9
contents.comment: Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

contents.name: q0
contents.comment: Reactive power values for endpoints (Q).  Typical Value = -0.31. Default: 0.0

contents.name: q1
contents.comment: Reactive power values for endpoints (Q).  Typical Value = -0.31. Default: 0.0

contents.name: q10
contents.comment: Reactive power values for endpoints (Q). Default: 0.0

contents.comment: Reactive power values for endpoints (Q).  Typical Value = -0.28. Default: 0.0

contents.comment: Reactive power values for endpoints (Q). Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tu1
contents.comment: UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tu2
contents.comment: UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tu3
contents.comment: UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tu4
contents.comment: UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tul
contents.comment: Time constant associated with optional integrator feedback input signal to UEL (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tup
contents.comment: Real power filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

contents.name: tuq
contents.comment: Reactive power filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tuv
contents.comment: Voltage filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

contents.name: vuimax
contents.comment: UEL integrator output maximum limit (V).  Typical Value = 0.25. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vuimin
contents.comment: UEL integrator output minimum limit (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vulmax
contents.comment: UEL output maximum limit (V).  Typical Value = 0.25. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vulmin
contents.comment: UEL output minimum limit (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
